Title: SharePoint 2010 Word Automation
Description:
A sample project /solution that contains some components for Word Automation in SharePoint 2010.

First component to be released is 4 custom workflow actions for converting documents that you can use in SharePoint Designer 2010.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A sample project /solution that contains some components for Word Automation in SharePoint 2010.

First component to be released is 4 custom workflow actions for converting documents that you can use in SharePoint Designer 2010.

Current features

  • Workflow actions
    • Convert Document
    • Get Conversion Job Status
    • Convert Folder
    • Convert Library
  • Ribbon button

Planned features

  • Metadata synchronization
  • More workflow actions
    • Convert Document Set


Please let me know if you would like to see other features and/or sample code.

For more information about this project please visit my blog:
http://blog.petergerritsen.nl/tag/word-automation/
